overview: We’re all for breaking down taboos, and what better way is there than introducing you to a pair of horny brothers – twins at that – who love nothing better than having filthy raw threesomes with other hyper-sexed twinks ...? Orlando White leads a stellar cast of cock-crazed beauties whose membership at the local gym involves hard dick at every turn and who simply won’t be satisfied until every drop of cum has been spilt! Little wonder rookie director, Joe Budai, has a veritable classic on his hands. As for your hands ... well, need we state the fucking obvious?!
title: Twin Takeover
